LanguageData.SP_PersonalityDesc.rulePack.rulesStrings: main->[PAWN_nameDef] is the [VAR_labelCol] and relies mostly on [PAWN_possessive] [DRIVE_labelCol].
desc1->[PAWN_nameDef] is well known for [PAWN_possessive] [TRAIT_labelCol] behavior.
desc1->It's [near] impossible to be more [TRAIT_labelCol] than [PAWN_nameDef].
desc1->[PAWN_nameDef] holds well-deserved reputation of being [being_most] [TRAIT_labelCol] people in the colony.
desc1->Asking if [PAWN_nameDef] is [TRAIT_labelCol] is like asking if a bear shits in the woods. Yes. Yes, [PAWN_pronoun] is.
desc1->If you like the company of [TRAIT_labelCol] people, [hang_around] [PAWN_nameDef][not_disappointed].
not_disappointed-> and you won't be disappointed
desc1->[PAWN_nameDef] is known for being [TRAIT_labelCol] about everything.
desc1->[PAWN_nameDef] could be called many things, [but] being [TRAIT_labelCol] is what people [discover] about [PAWN_objective] first.
desc1->Not a single day goes by without [PAWN_nameDef] reminding everyone how [TRAIT_labelCol] [PAWN_pronoun] is.
desc1->Some hate [PAWN_objective], some love [PAWN_objective] for how [TRAIT_labelCol] [PAWN_pronoun] is.[middleground]
desc1->Sooner or later, [PAWN_nameDef] overwhelms everyone with being [notoriously].
desc1->[time] with [PAWN_nameDef] is enough to [discover] how [very2] [TRAIT_labelCol] [PAWN_pronoun] is.
desc1->Over the years [PAWN_nameDef] has grown to be [very1] [TRAIT_labelCol] person.[secondnature]
desc1->[PAWN_nameDef] has reached mastery in being [TRAIT_labelCol].
desc1->With [PAWN_possessive] [very1] [TRAIT_labelCol] attitude, [PAWN_nameDef] cannot be mistaken for anyone else.
desc1->[PAWN_nameDef] is a walking definition of the [TRAIT_labelCol] person.
desc2->Although it’s not obvious at first, [PAWN_pronoun]’s also [quite] [TRAIT_labelCol].
desc2->[PAWN_pronoun] is [notably] more [TRAIT_labelCol] in the presence of [strangers].
desc2->[PAWN_pronoun] is [notably] more [TRAIT_labelCol] when dealing with [traders].
desc2->[PAWN_pronoun]’s also [quite] [TRAIT_labelCol] and [PAWN_pronoun] [likes] it that way.
desc2->[PAWN_pronoun] tries to not be so [TRAIT_labelCol] anymore[mixed_results].
mixed_results->, but it is what it is
mixed_results->, with mixed results so far
mixed_results->. Not much of a progress for now
desc2->[PAWN_pronoun] starts behaving more [TRAIT_labelCol] in the presence of [sexbehavior].
desc2->[PAWN_pronoun] shifts towards [TRAIT_labelCol] attitude when meeting with [group].
desc2->During [serious] conversations [PAWN_pronoun] purposefully tries to be [TRAIT_labelCol].
desc2->Under right circumstances [PAWN_pronoun] lets [PAWN_objective]self to be [TRAIT_labelCol].
desc2->[PAWN_pronoun] tries to be more [TRAIT_labelCol] than [PAWN_pronoun] really is, when [PAWN_pronoun] thinks it will be well received.
desc2->Sometimes [PAWNronoun] also shows [PAWN_objective]self from the [TRAIT_labelCol] side.
desc2->[PAWN_pronoun] tries not to show it[publicly], but [PAWN_pronoun]'s [alsotraitcol].
desc2->[PAWN_pronoun] is known to be [TRAIT_labelCol] when dealing with [matters].
desc2->The more time [PAWN_pronoun] spends [somewhere], the more [TRAIT_labelCol] [PAWN_pronoun] becomes after.
desc3(p=0.5)->Only closest friends know [PAWN_possessive] [TRAIT_labelCol] side of [character].
desc3(p=0.5)->[PAWN_nameDef] used to be [TRAIT_labelCol]. Maybe [PAWN_pronoun] still is, just a lot less.
desc3(p=0.5)->[PAWN_pronoun] didn't use to be particularly [TRAIT_labelCol], but that changed [after].
desc3(p=0.5)->Rumor has it [PAWN_pronoun]’s becoming more and more [TRAIT_labelCol].
desc3(p=0.5)->[sometimes1], [PAWN_pronoun] becomes awkwardly [TRAIT_labelCol] for no apparent reason.
desc3(p=0.5)->Surprisingly for many, [PAWN_pronoun] can be very [TRAIT_labelCol].
desc3(p=0.5)->Given enough time, [PAWN_pronoun] turns out to be [TRAIT_labelCol] person.
desc3(p=0.5)->[PAWN_nameDef] [likes] to mention how [TRAIT_labelCol] [PAWN_pronoun] was when [PAWN_pronoun] was [child].
desc3(p=0.5)->It's disturbing how [PAWN_nameDef] considers [PAWN_objective]self [TRAIT_labelCol]. Not many think that about [PAWN_objective].
desc3->[sometimes1] [PAWN_pronoun] fades out and mutters under [PAWN_possessive] breath: [quoteweird]
quoteweird->“What was, will be. What will be, was.”
quoteweird->“Ab Hoc Possum Videre Domum Tuum.”
quoteweird-><color=#54bf11>"Ph'nglui mglw'nafh Cthulhu R'lyeh wgah'nagl fhtagn."</color>
susactivity->roaming around the colony at night
desc3(p=0.5)->[PAWN_nameDef] stutters from time to time.
desc3->[PAWN_nameDef] has [bizarre] habit [PAWN_pronoun] tries to hide.
desc3->[PAWN_nameDef] has a [suspicious] [littlenotebook] where [PAWN_pronoun] writes down all kinds of things.
deeplooks->looks [PAWN_possessive] interlocutors deep in the eyes
deeplooks->looks [PAWN_possessive] interlocutors deep in the eyes as if [PAWN_pronoun] sees their soul
desc3->[PAWN_nameDef] is one of the colonists that use [bizarre] handshake.
memorandum->a pocket watch with someone's photo
memento-> A memento of the past.
memento-> A precious souvenir from the past.
mannerism1->talks in a highly formal way
mannerism1->talks in a very informal way
desc3->[PAWN_nameDef] [thoughtaboutit] and [PAWN_pronoun] [agrees] that some [warcrimes] are justified.
thoughtaboutit->has thought about it for a while
feels_best-> can rely on people around
feels_best-> is not pressured by anyone
strategy->target the biggest group of enemies
goals->make the world a better place
hotgossip->a spy from a hostile faction
hotgossip->an alien in a humanoid suit
hotgossip->in possesion of a treasure map
hotgossip->a part of the secret police
hotgossip->a part of the masonic lodge
desc3->In the past [PAWN_nameDef] [questionabledeed] once, and everyone remembers that.
questionabledeed->tried to adopt a grown man
desc3->[PAWN_nameDef] has a recurring dream about [dream]. [PAWN_pronoun] [likes] to talk about it.
desc3->[PAWN_nameDef] has a recurring dream about a [dreamlonger]. [PAWN_pronoun] [likes] to talk about it.
dreamaction->getting lost in a transport pod
dreamaction->selling drugs to raise money for children
psychoSecondary->[PAWN_pronoun] [likes] to sneak around at night and watch people sleep.
psychoSecondary->[PAWN_pronoun]'s just a really creepy person.
psychoSecondary->Nobody knows what to think of [PAWN_objective], [but] everyone agrees that they feel uneasy around them.
psychoSecondary->[PAWN_pronoun] wandered to the edge of madness and [madness].
madness->put a piece of it inside [PAWN_objective]self
psychoSecondary->[PAWN_pronoun]'s daydreaming about gutting other colonists.
psychoSecondary->[PAWN_pronoun] recurrently fades out and mutters under [PAWN_possessive] breath: [quoteweird]
psychoSecondary->[PAWN_pronoun] has an advanced antisocial personality disorder.
ima_friend->with a knife and without a face
psychoSecondary->[sometimes1] [PAWN_pronoun] hears ominous whispers and does as they say.
psychoSecondary->[sometimes1] [PAWN_pronoun] wakes up late at night and starts laughing.
psychoSecondary->[PAWN_pronoun]'s convinced that other colonists are [plotting].
psychoSecondary->[PAWN_pronoun] sees the world through a morbid lens. To [PAWN_objective], the smell of blood is as pleasant as the fragrance of flowers.
wickedthing->sounds of screams and broken bones
wickedthing->patterns made by the flow of freshly spilled blood
psychoSecondary->[PAWN_pronoun] [likespsycho] [animalspsycho] with huge passion and a smirk on [PAWN_possessive] face.
psychoSecondary->[PAWN_pronoun] is frequently absentminded and dissociated from reality.
psychoSecondary(p=2)->[PAWN_pronoun] has an unusual fascination with [strangeactivity].
psychoSecondary->[PAWN_pronoun] has no remorse when it comes to manipulating others.
psychoSecondary->[PAWN_pronoun] volunteers every time the prisoners need to be taken care of.
psychoSecondary->[PAWN_pronoun] is completely devoid of empathy.
LanguageData.SP_PersonalityRevealed.rulePack.rulesStr: talk->[RECRUITER_nameDef] spent enough time with [PRISONER_nameDef] to understand their personality.
psycast->[RECRUITER_nameDef] has used their Word of Trust psycast to reveal [PRISONER_nameDef]'s personality.
